snippet: With members of Congress back in their district for a five-week recess, leaders in both parties are working overtime to make sure that their respective messages on Medicare are being pounded on back home.
abstract: With members of Congress back in their district for a five-week recess, leaders in both parties are working overtime to make sure that their respective messages on Medicare are being pounded on back home.

headline.main: Congressional Leaders Issue Medicare Talking Points for August
